name: Healthy Breakfast Smoothie Bowl
author: Sarah Green
description: A nutritious and colorful smoothie bowl packed with fruits, protein, and healthy toppings. Perfect for a refreshing breakfast or post-workout meal.
recipeIngredient: Toppings: sliced fresh fruits, granola, coconut flakes, nuts
recipeInstructions: Add frozen banana, berries, Greek yogurt, and almond milk to a blender.
Blend until smooth but still thick. If mixture is too thick, add a little more almond milk.
Add honey or maple syrup if desired and blend briefly to combine.
Pour smoothie mixture into a bowl.
Top with fresh fruit slices, a sprinkle of granola, coconut flakes, and a sprinkle of chia seeds.
Serve immediately and enjoy with a spoon!
